# Incident Overview

Describe the production incident, including affected services, duration,
and the point at which severity classification influenced the response.

# AI Severity Classification Impact

Explain how the AI-generated severity rating affected escalation timing,
responder engagement, and decision-making during the incident.

# Human Judgment Boundary

Identify where human responders deferred to the AI classification and
where intervention was possible but did not occur.

# Operational and Business Impact

Detail the reliability, customer, and business consequences that resulted
from delayed or insufficient response.

# Accountability Assessment

State where accountability lies for the outcome and justify the reasoning
without assigning individual blame.

# Post-Incident Decision

Decide what must happen to this AI severity classification system
immediately following the incident.
